resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76871</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76871</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>7b0911f5-0a4b-49c8-85f5-e92c732c8c32#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az epe szerepe a zsírok emésztésében</string>
            <string language="en">Bile's role in digestion of fats</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rolle der Galle in der Verdauung der Fette</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le rôle de la bile dans la digestion des 
graisses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Papel do bile na digestão das gorduras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ruolo della bile nella digestione dei grassi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρόλος χολής στην πέψη των λιπών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Papel de la bilis en la digestión de grasas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az epe hatóanyagainak hatására a táplálékkal felvett zsírok kisebb cseppekre esnek szét.</string>
            <string language="en">As a result of the bile's effective agents the fats ingested with food break up into smaller drops.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">epe,  zsíremésztés,  emésztés,  máj,  </string>
            <string language="en">bile, fat-digestion, digestion, liver</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Resultierend aus den wirkungsvollen Mitteln der 
Galle zerbrechen die Fette, die mit Nahrung eingenommen werden, in 
kleinere Tropfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En raison des agents pertinents de la bile les 
graisses ingérées avec la nourriture se décomposent en de plus 
petites baisses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em conseqüência dos agentes eficazes do bile as
gorduras ingested com alimento quebram acima em gotas menores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come conseguenza degli agenti efficaci della bile i
grassi ingeriti con alimento si rompono in su nelle più piccole 
gocce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ως αποτέλεσμα των αποτελεσματικών πρακτόρων της χολής 
τα λίπη που λαμβάνονται με τα τρόφιμα χωρίζουν στις μικρότερες 
απελευθερώσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Como resultado de los agentes eficaces de la 
bilis las grasas injeridas con el alimento se rompen para arriba en 
gotas más pequeñas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galle, Fettverdauung, Verdauung, Leber</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bile, gros-digestion, digestion, foie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bile, gordo-digestão, digestão, fígado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bile, grasso-digestione, digestione, fegato</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χολή, παχύς-πέψη, πέψη, συκώτι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bilis, gordo-digestio'n, digestión, hígado</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76871</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>

  </manifestation>
